import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Button, CardBody, CardGroup, Col, Container, Form, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Row } from 'reactstrap'; import { Accordion, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; class QuoteReqUpdate extends Component { state = { selectedItem: this.props.selectedQuote, open: false } setCollapse(tmp) { this.setState({ open: tmp }); } resetReq() { } saveQuoteUpdate() { } render() { return (

); } } export default QuoteReqUpdate;
